languages.text: At the beginning of combat, the wearer gets the {g|f:083d5280759b4ed3a2d0b61254653273}Medikit{/g} and {g|f:b6daa597bb6b5114bb9e21ea1e855792}Onslaught{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, which reproduce the effect of the medikit and onslaught consumables, costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Each of these abilities can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text: At the beginning of combat, the wearer gets the Medikit and Onslaught {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, which reproduce the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of the medikit and onslaught consumables, costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Each of these abilities can only be used once per combat.

At the beginning of combat, the wearer gets the Medikit and Onslaught {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, which reproduce the effect of the medikit and onslaught consumables, costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Each of these abilities can only be used once per combat.

At the beginning of combat, the wearer gets the Medikit and Onslaught {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, which reproduce the effect of the medikit and onslaught consumables, costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Each of these abilities can only be used once per combat.

languages.text: 战斗开始时，装备者获得 {g|f:083d5280759b4ed3a2d0b61254653273}医疗包{/g}与{g|f:b6daa597bb6b5114bb9e21ea1e855792}疾行灵药{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，能力效果分别等同于医疗包与疾行灵药的效果，不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。每种能力每场战斗只能使用一次。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of combat, the wearer gets the {g|f:083d5280759b4ed3a2d0b61254653273}Medikit{/g} and {g|f:b6daa597bb6b5114bb9e21ea1e855792}Onslaught{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, which reproduce the effect of the medikit and onslaught consumables, costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Each of these abilities can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text: 战斗开始时，装备者获得医疗包与疾行灵药{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，能力{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}分别等同于医疗包与疾行灵药的效果，不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。每种能力每场战斗只能使用一次。
战斗开始时，装备者获得医疗包与疾行灵药{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，能力{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}分别等同于医疗包与疾行灵药的效果，不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。每种能力每场战斗只能使用一次。

languages.text: 戦闘開始時、使用者は消耗品であるメディキットと猛攻撃の効果を消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コスト0で再現する、メディキットと猛攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。これらのアビリティはそれぞれ1戦闘につき1回だけ使用できる。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of combat, the wearer gets the Medikit and Onslaught {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, which reproduce the effect of the medikit and onslaught consumables, costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Each of these abilities can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘開始時、着用者は消耗品であるメディキットと猛攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を再現するメディキットと猛攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を0{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストで獲得する。これらのアビリティはそれぞれ戦闘毎に1回しか使用できない。
戦闘開始時、着用者は消耗品であるメディキットと猛攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を再現するメディキットと猛攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を0{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストで獲得する。これらのアビリティはそれぞれ戦闘毎に1回しか使用できない。

languages.text: Al principio del combate, el portador obtiene las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} {g|f:083d5280759b4ed3a2d0b61254653273}Botiquín{/g} y {g|f:b6daa597bb6b5114bb9e21ea1e855792}Acometida{/g}, que imitan los efectos de los consumibles botiquín y acometida a un coste de 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Cada una de estas capacidades solo puede usarse una vez por combate.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of combat, the wearer gets the {g|f:083d5280759b4ed3a2d0b61254653273}Medikit{/g} and {g|f:b6daa597bb6b5114bb9e21ea1e855792}Onslaught{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, which reproduce the effect of the medikit and onslaught consumables, costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Each of these abilities can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text: Al principio del combate, el portador obtiene las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} Botiquín y Acometida, que imitan los {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efectos{/g} de los consumibles botiquín y acometida a un coste de 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Cada una de estas capacidades solo puede usarse una vez por combate.

languages.text: Zu Beginn des Kampfes erhält der Träger die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} {g|f:083d5280759b4ed3a2d0b61254653273}Medikit{/g} und {g|f:b6daa597bb6b5114bb9e21ea1e855792}Ansturm{/g}, die den Effekt des Medikits und der Ansturm-Verbrauchsgegenstände reproduzieren und 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kosten. Jede dieser Fähigkeiten kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of combat, the wearer gets the {g|f:083d5280759b4ed3a2d0b61254653273}Medikit{/g} and {g|f:b6daa597bb6b5114bb9e21ea1e855792}Onslaught{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, which reproduce the effect of the medikit and onslaught consumables, costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Each of these abilities can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn des Kampfes erhält der Träger die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} Medikit- und Ansturm, die den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} des Medikits und der Ansturm-Verbrauchsgegenstände reproduzieren und 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kosten. Jede dieser Fähigkeiten kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.

languages.text: В начале боя персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} Медкомплект и Резня, которые не требуют затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и действуют аналогично соответствующим расходным предметам. Каждую из этих способностей можно применить не более 1 раза за бой.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of combat, the wearer gets the Medikit and Onslaught {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, which reproduce the effect of the medikit and onslaught consumables, costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Each of these abilities can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text: В начале боя персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} Медкомплект и Резня, которые не требуют затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и действуют аналогично соответствующим расходным предметам. Каждую из этих способностей можно применить не более 1 раза за бой.

В начале боя персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} Медкомплект и Резня, которые не требуют затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и действуют аналогично соответствующим расходным предметам. Каждую из этих способностей можно применить не более 1 раза за бой.

languages.text: Au début du combat, l'utilisateur acquiert les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} {g|f:083d5280759b4ed3a2d0b61254653273}Médikit{/g} et {g|f:b6daa597bb6b5114bb9e21ea1e855792}Onslaught{/g}, qui reproduisent l'effet des consommables Médikit et Onslaught pour 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Chacune de ces capacités ne peut être utilisée qu'une seule fois par combat.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of combat, the wearer gets the {g|f:083d5280759b4ed3a2d0b61254653273}Medikit{/g} and {g|f:b6daa597bb6b5114bb9e21ea1e855792}Onslaught{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, which reproduce the effect of the medikit and onslaught consumables, costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Each of these abilities can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text: Au début du combat, l'utilisateur acquiert les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} Médikit et Onslaught, qui reproduisent l'effet des consommables Médikit et Onslaught pour 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Chacune de ces capacités ne peut être utilisée qu'une seule fois par combat.

languages.text: Giyen kişi; çatışmanın başlangıcında, sıhhiye çantası ve çılgınca akın sarf eşyalarıyla aynı etkileri yaratan ve {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} bedelleri 0 olan {g|f:083d5280759b4ed3a2d0b61254653273}Sıhhiye Çantası{/g} ve {g|f:b6daa597bb6b5114bb9e21ea1e855792}Çılgınca Akın{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerini{/g} kazanır. Bu kabiliyetlerden her biri, bir çatışmada sadece bir kez kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of combat, the wearer gets the {g|f:083d5280759b4ed3a2d0b61254653273}Medikit{/g} and {g|f:b6daa597bb6b5114bb9e21ea1e855792}Onslaught{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, which reproduce the effect of the medikit and onslaught consumables, costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Each of these abilities can only be used once per combat.
